title: Marauder Ashe and Warwick Fanart

embed.description: Marauder Ashe and Warwick These skins look awesome! www.surrenderat20.net/2015/01/...

body: Upcoming skins look amazing had to draw them.

replies.body:
Holy crap! So quick! 

This looks amazing!
Thank you!

They look like such good friends too.

Which makes sense, since they're both hunters.

This is pretty nice.
I love these 2 skin sets they are releasing they remind me of dark souls
That is absolutely great!
Thanks!

Why the fuck is Ashe getting a new skin? ...

Zac and Yorrick are weeping.

To be fair Yorrick doesn't have much skin because it rotted off his dead body.
And Zac doesn't have skin at all in the first place.
It just goes well with the lore

> [{quoted}](name=viva la me,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=9EUhi6WI,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2015-01-29T00:07:31.603+0000)
>
> To be fair Yorrick doesn't have much skin because it rotted off his dead body.
> And Zac doesn't have skin at all in the first place.
> It just goes well with the lore


"fair". How ironic.... 

Ashe has 5, now 6 skins. 

Warwick has 6, now 7 skins. 

So. Fucking. Fair.
And yet you say nothing about Annie getting her tenth skin.

This thread was specifically about Ashe and Warwick. 

It's not like I have a bias for ANY champ. 

I don't even like Yorick. I'm only talking about what's FAIR.
Wow great colors!! Nice work! :O
Warwick - Rengar would be nice. Both hunters.
That looks really great! How do you determine the form of the objects in the picture. I can't seem to convert my technical skill into the digital field. Please help!
fucking love your creation

I wonder why those two are getting those skins, dont get me wrong im loving the skins, im just curious as to the reason why they were chosen.  

Great fanart too, really captures the vibe these skins give off. Well done.
Ashe is fairly easy to make skins for I think - more human champs just get more in general because of that.

Actually human champs are harder to make skins for because they rely so much on their clothing and hair to tell them apart and guess what gets changed in skins. Riot even mention this is one of the problems they have with Diana.
Ye i was just curious why Ashe and not like Vayne or Quinn or any other female ADC, why specifically Ashe. The Warwick one i understand.
These look really amazing, I hope you post more fanart of skins in the future. {{champion:115}}
That Looks Sick
Awesome work!
Awesome drawing, wish I had the skills to do that
Why do I look at Marauder Ashe and think "Keyblade Armor?"

hmm I would imagine that as marauder's they would be part of a group of 7-10 champions since Marauders are raiders, meaning there would be more than just what Riot has given us so far. This could mean that they could be working on more Marauder skins, I think the champs who could do well in a Marauder skin could be: Garen, Darius, Talon, Sejuani, Fiora, Tryndamere, Jax, Yasuo, and maybe others but those are the one who could be primary targets for a Marauder skin
This makes me sad that I bought hyena Warwick

From what i know this skin is a 750 rp .
But hyena is still pretty good skin, that laugh.
Yeah, I like the hyena skin and all but this one is cool too and I don't like having to choose
these are fantastic
Thank you!
take my money
Next patch, Riot will gladly do so. I'm excited for these skins, and I don't play either champ.
